overview:
As CEO and Chief Marketing Officer of Sociallybuzz, Andre Kay brings an extensive background to the table. Sociallybuzz provides social media management, marketing, fan-page app development and social media consultation to various clienteles. The company is designed to help brands and businesses develop a firm foundation in social media and marketing while delivering the greatest number of options in how they define or reach their relevant audiences.

Prior to being acquired, Andre Kay was the Vice President of Go Media Marketing, Corp. GMM was a strategic technology marketing and mobile media advertising company. Under his operation, GMM was awarded the # 1 minority outdoor marketing company in South Florida, the 2009 and 2010 Best of Miami Beach Outdoor Advertising services from the US Commerce Association (USCA). GMM was also the pioneer of introducing texting technology to the US Congress as a way to communicate with their constituents. Furthermore, Andre Kay was recently nominated for an African-American Achievers award.
